alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Norton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 7:52PM CDT until August 05 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Norton County in northwestern Kansas... Eastern Decatur County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 752 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Oberlin, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Jennings around 810 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Norcatur and Clayton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
